alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Otero; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 3:55PM MDT until June 07 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Southwestern Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... Southeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 354 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles south of Salt Creek, or 16 miles south of Pueblo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reported half dollar size hail. This storm remains capable of producing 2 inch hail. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fowler and Olney Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
